description: React component definitions for a custom Menubar UI, utilizing Radix UI primitives and lucide-react icons.

methods.name: MenubarSub
methods.description: Wrapper component for MenubarPrimitive.Sub with data-slot attribute.

methods.name: Menubar
methods.description: Main Menubar component using React.forwardRef, styled with utility class names.

methods.name: MenubarTrigger
methods.description: Trigger button for Menubar, styled and forwarded ref.

methods.name: MenubarSubTrigger
methods.description: Submenu trigger with optional inset styling and ChevronRight icon.

methods.name: MenubarSubContent
methods.description: Content container for submenu, with animated and responsive styles.

methods.name: MenubarContent
methods.description: Main menu content container, with positioning and animation styles.

methods.name: MenubarItem
methods.description: Menu item component with focus and disabled styles.

methods.name: MenubarCheckboxItem
methods.description: Checkbox menu item with indicator icon.

methods.name: MenubarRadioItem
methods.description: Radio button menu item with indicator icon.
